S04n396:4: tatra devanikāyeṣu sukuṇḍalo nāma devaputro daridro duścittaśceti |
S04n396:5: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sa tena brāhmaṇarūpeṇa tasya devaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n396:6: upasaṃkramya sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ dāridryaduḥkhavyupaśamāya taṃ devaputrametadavocat–bubhukṣito'haṃ tṛṣitaśceti |
S04n396:7: atha sa devaputro rudaṃstaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat–na ca me brāhmaṇa kiṃcitsaṃvidyate |
S04n396:9: atha sa devaputro vimānaṃ praviśya sarvabhāṇḍaṃ nirabhyavekṣitumārabdhaḥ |
S04n396:10: sa ca paripatitaṃ niveśanaṃ divyairmahārhai ratnabhāṇḍaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ dakṣiṇapārśvam,
S04n396:11: anyāni ca bhāṇḍāni divyarasarasāgropetairāhāraiḥ paripūrṇāni vāmapārśve vimānasya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sarvapuṣpagandhādibhiḥ paripūrṇāni ||
S04n396:12: atha sa devaputra etad dṛṣṭaivaṃ cintāmāpede–avaśyamayaṃ sa satpātro dvāre sthito yasya darśanamātreṇāpidṛśī lakṣmīrmamānuprāptā |
S04n396:15: sa ca brāhmaṇastena devaputreṇa vimāne praviśya tairdivyaratnaiḥ pratipāditaḥ,
S04n396:23: atha sa brāhmaṇo devaputrametadavocat–tathāgatādhyuṣitā sā bhūmī ramaṇīyā divyamaṇiratnaparikhacitā pariśobhitā |
S04n396:27: vividhāśca śīlavanto guṇavanto dakṣiṇīyā dṛśyante viśvabhuvaḥ |
S04n396:30: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat–avaśyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇa satyaṃ pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
S04n396:33: na ca manuṣyasyedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ tava nimittaṃ bhavati |
S04n396:38: upanāmayitvā ca sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣita(vān)–
S04n396:41: atha sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraiva prakrāntaḥ ||
